abstracts.cdata!:
The project would support the
            construction of 500 public tubewells of three basic
            alternative designs in 12 Districts of the State of Uttar
            Pradesh over a two-year period, with the objective of
            demonstrating and evaluating the relative merits of a number
            of technical and operational improvements to the design of
            existing tubewell systems in the State. The twelve districts
            represent the full range of agro-climatic conditions in the
            state. A small fund for preparation of a second-stage
            project to introduce new tubewell designs throughout the
            state would also be provided under the project. The project
            would expand the irrigated area in Uttar Pradesh
            significantly and would result in increased foodgrain,
            sugarcane, and oilseed production.
